eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mohave, AZ; AT 02:46 PM ON SEP 07, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:57 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Meadview, AZ Precautionary Boil Notice. Joshua Valley Utility Company is issuing a precautionary boil notice. Until the utility company gas informed you the water is safe to drink, we advise you to use bottled water or boil all tap water before consumption or use.
